survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with digital onboarding tools and identify areas for improvement in the onboarding process.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital onboarding tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital onboarding tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which digital onboarding tools did you use during your onboarding process? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture tool usage accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with open-text input.

script.question_text: Which digital onboarding tools did you use during your onboarding process? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on challenges.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face during the digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of navigating the digital onboarding tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure ease of navigation.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of navigating the digital onboarding tools?

questions.question_text: Do you have any suggestions for improving the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback for improvements.

script.question_text: Do you have any suggestions for improving the digital onboarding process?
